thread.title: ‘The Great Wall’ Has Weak North American Opening - WSJ
thread.title_full: ‘The Great Wall’ Has Weak North American Opening - WSJ

author: Ben Fritz
title: ‘The Great Wall’ Has Weak North American Opening - WSJ
text:
‘The Great Wall’ Has Weak North American Opening Movie was No. 3 at box office behind ‘The Lego Batman Movie’ and ‘Fifty Shades Darker’ By @benfritz Updated Feb. 20, 2017 4:13 p.m. ET 
Backers’ hopes that “The Great Wall” would be the first global hit made in China fizzled this weekend as the big budget movie opened to a soft $21.7 million in the U.S. and Canada. 
It was No. 3 at the domestic box office over the four-day Presidents Day weekend, behind “The Lego Batman Movie” and “Fifty Shades Darker,” both of which opened the prior week.
